divs: Sighting DetailsI smoke cigarettes outside where i often star gaze. On the aforementioned night I was watching a sattelite cross the sky when it made a 90 degree turn and with a flash accelerated and then zoomed away almost instantly
Summary: Am avid sky watcher and track satellites all the time but this one time it made 90 degree turn and accerated.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Union
This sighting has never been favorited.
